content: intricate hearts adorn this softer-than-velvet knit blanket that s a warm addition to baby s world created in bernat baby velvet yarn you ll soon discover that the fascinating design is actually easier than it looks to achieve using a slipped-stitch mosaic knitting technique each color is worked individually in pairs of row ensuring that you re only ever working with one strand of yarn at a time it s an interesting project that you can customize to match any nursery or playroom so give this blanket with love materials size u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needle 36 91 5 cm long
